author: senh
title: Lonely Planet reveals its 'ultimate' destinations
text: Loading... BING NEWS: Lonely Planet reveals the best tourist attractions in the world – including Angkor Wat, the Great Barrier Reef and Machu Picchu The Temples of Angkor in Cambodia have been named the best sight in the world by Lonely Planet. In a new book, Ultimate Travelist, Lonely Planet has ranked 500 of the best places to visit across the globe, creating a must-see bucket list for travellers. 08/18/2015 - 12:59 am | View Link Love travel? The world’s top ten most intoxicating sights unveiled in new Lonely Planet superlist the definitive list of the 500 best places to visit in the world has been compiled in a new book Ultimate Travelist. Voted the number one place to visit in the world by what Lonely Planet has called a ‘landslide’, Angkor Wat is considered the world’s ... 08/18/2015 - 12:57 am | View Link Lonely Planet reveals its 'ultimate' travel destinations (CNN)Four decades after it began as a penniless backpacker's bible to traveling on the cheap, Lonely Planet is publishing what it says is the definitive guide to the world's top tourism attractions.
